snippet.title: Shadows Are Alive [Gameplay Trailer #2]
snippet.description:
Support our new Kickstarter HERE!!!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/shadows2023/shadows-are-alive-friends-frights-and-fading-lights

Prepare for a jaw-dropping, adrenaline-pumping adventure in a world where spooky meets cute, and your childhood fantasies become your best tools for survival! Shadows Are Alive is an action survival horror game like no other; imagine "Dead by Daylight" meets "Luigi's Mansion," but with a twist that will leave you spellbound.

Wishlist our game on steam!!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2554930/Shadows_Are_Alive/

Follow the link below to our socials, and join our discord to stay up to date!
linktr.ee/shadowsarealive

#indiegames #partygames #horrorgaming
